channel.title: Our Resources on OSPO++
channel.description: Recent content in Our Resources on OSPO++

item.title: OSF primer on code and software
item.description: OSPO++ in partnership with the US National Academies of Science, Engineering and Medicine have created the OSF primer on code and software, a toolkit for fostering Open Science Practices.

item.title: The Potential for OSPO++ to OSPO++ Cooperation
item.description: OSPO++ Policy, Governments & Agencies Working Group OSPO++ was honored to host a very special global event on Institutionalizing Open Source and building new cooperation infrastructure.

item.title: All the Boats Must Rise
item.description: In 20+ years of helping all sorts of organizations and people understand and participate in Open Source, the most difficult concept for learners is what I call the “All Boats Must Rise” concept.

item.title: University Open Source Program Offices
item.description: The Sheridan Libraries at Johns Hopkins University (JHU) have launched the first US university-based open source programs office (OSPO).
